data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.0.3 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.1 PB 5
data.actual_result: It uses "Channel permission" instead of "Back" as the string.
data.expected_result: The title for permission overrides should be "Back" & "Permission Overrides" (in German "Zurück Berechtigungs-Ausnahmen").
data.short_description: Wrong string used for back button for some languages for several sections
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your language to German (also a problem with other languages as noted below) - Edit a text channel, category or voice channel ("Channel/Kategorie bearbeiten" in German) - Go to permissions ("Berechtigungen") - Click on any member or role and open the permission overrides - Observe the title for this menu
